name: FLY SIMULATOR (itch)
description:
you can only control 1 direction up you move forward automaticlly.

there is no goal you just fly around.

this is my 2nd game-jam.

im not very happy with the resualts, there was a goal intended i ran out of time, i didn't make any of the art assets.
